channel.title: How do I make Rune bolt stronger?
channel.description: First off raising the bonus doesn't do anything, secondly I only want Rune bolts to hit higher not the other bolts.

item.title: How do I make Rune bolt stronger?
item.dc:creator: @pure_ess_ftw pure ess ftw
item.description:
@pure_ess_ftw wrote:

i know this lemee find what to serch for hold on 1 min
if(!hasCrystalBow() && (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 837))
search that and under it you will see 1.95D switch the 1.95 ps. mine is currently set to 2.822 and it hits around 30’s sometimes 40’s and if you need void(range)to be increased a few lines under it you will see
if(FullVRange())
{
d += d * 0.(numbers)
if you switch the number part void range(if you are wearing it) should increase the amount you hit note if you want to switch other arrows just look above the 837 one (837 is arrow/bolt id) and if you want to switch dbow i beleive its right under rune bolts

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make Rune bolt stronger?
